entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 29 December 2022
